column2: The Master said, Love makes a spot beautiful: who chooses not to dwell in love, has he got wisdom?
column3: The Master said, Love makes a spot beautiful: who chooses not to dwell in love, has he got wisdom?

column2: The Master said, Loveless men cannot bear need long, they cannot bear fortune long.
column3: The Master said, Loveless men cannot bear need long, they cannot bear fortune long.

column2: The Master said, A man and his faults are of a piece.
column3: The Master said, A man and his faults are of a piece.

column2: By watching his faults we learn whether love be his.
column3: By watching his faults we learn whether love be his.

column2: The Master said, The chase of gain is rich in hate.
column3: The Master said, The chase of gain is rich in hate.

column2: The Master said, What is it to sway a kingdom by courteous yielding?
column3: The Master said, What is it to sway a kingdom by courteous yielding?

column2: After the Master had left, the disciples asked what was meant.
column3: After the Master had left, the disciples asked what was meant.

column2: If thou must travel, hold a set course.
column3: If thou must travel, hold a set course.
